body: Hi guys, i´ve got a problem with daylight simulation. Some windows are counted as radiance material and some windows are not. I´ve checked (with itersect tool in rhino) if they all are coplanar with the wall and yes they are, as i build them copying InPlace the wall and scale it. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/irXjnN9QuLJj8s8HuOsJr-*RDDdbL4PsgFY7u5643-JlBYaKcPnVUcHYXAblEsZlkaNigbyxBh7yOn2vKB0PAMah-zYSAD46/2.JPG) but, as you can see, for some windows i get no result, and, according to the LabelZoneSurfaces component, those windows are not counted as Radiance Material. What should i do? What is the problem? Let me know if you need the rhino and gh files.   N.B. (I can´t find the way to reply to my discussion so i´m writing a new one, hope it is no a problem)  Thanks a lot in advance Claudia
